short_summary: Establish up to a maximum of four National Individual Standing Offers (NISOs) for the supply and delivery of Hydrometric instruments and its spare parts on an as and when requested basis
description: The Department of the Environment (ECCC) aims to establish one to a maximum of four National Individual Standing Offers (NISOs) for the supply and delivery of hydrometric instruments and its spare parts. We want the supplier to provide high-quality and accurate hydrometric instruments and appropriate spare parts, packaged in sturdy and secure containers with proper labeling.

full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer

## RFSO ID

* **Reference Number:** WS4406712013.Doc4509640998

## Tender Details

* **Title (English/French):** Request for Standing Offer for Hydrometric Instruments/Demande d'offre à commandes pour instruments hydrométriques
* **Status:** Expiré/Expired (Closing Date has passed)
* **Closing Date and Time:** 2024-05-03T14:00:00

## Background

The Department of the Environment (ECCC) is seeking Standing Offers for Hydrometric Instruments and Spare Parts from suppliers who meet specific technical and commercial requirements. The Contracting Authority intends to conduct Open Bidding, where all eligible bidders are given equal opportunities to submit their proposals.

## Goods and Services

* **UNSPC Code:** 41114300 (Hydrological Instruments)
* **Description:** Supply and delivery of Hydrometric instruments and its spare parts as and when required

## Authorized Status

This Standing Offer is authorized under the [Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)], [Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement], and other applicable trade agreements.

## Delivery Location

* **Regions of Delivery (English/French):** Canada (Qualifying County and Territory)

## Contact and Support

* **Contract Manager Name:** Yessica Karnali (SPAC/PSPC) (she/her)
* **Contract Manager Email:** [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Downloads

You can download the Standing Offer Request documents from [Ariba Discovery link here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19278721?extsite=MTkyNzg3MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Timeframe

You will find detailed information on the bid submission timeline and technical requirements in the Standing Offer Request documents.

**Stoppress:** DO NOT PAY ATTENTION to the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline, instead send ALL BIDS TO SPAC before the closing date of 3 MAY 2024 at 14:00 EDT. All rejected bids will be regarded not valid.

Don't forget to add links to Ariba discovery. Responsive to amendments requiring need-to subsetns Shortcut documentation when
